Title: FLOSS Weekly 753: Small Is Beautiful - Aral Balkan, Small Technology Foundation
Description:
Aral Balkan of the Small Technology Foundation talks with Doc Searls and Dan Lynch about the small web, the tame little server called Kitten, and much more about the wide open world we've been losing and how to get it back.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Dan Lynch

Guest: Aral Balkan

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly

Think your open source project should be on FLOSS Weekly? Email floss@twit.tv.
